text: I had to update my file in the codegallery and wanted to know how long it takes to reflect those changes on <https://designers.HubSpot.com/code-gallery/entry/founders/ericsalvi-Add-Reading-Minutes-to-Blog-Posts?hsLang=en>
in my experience, it was pretty quick
If you experience sluggish updates on code gallery please ping AJ or I.  I will look into this for ya.

So it should not take more than 24 hours for your updates to be reflected. We do not do it in real time as we need to sync a lot of repos and the most important parts of the repos for the gallery’s sake is the description, categories, name etc. and that stuff doesn’t change often. If someone wanted to use your submission they would normally clone/download your repo right on github.
If it takes more than 24 hours please let us know.
weird.  i swear my changes were made close to immediately.  must have timed it right
That’s likely the case Dennis, I don’t know offhand what time of day they get synced exactly.  but within a day is still relatively quick.
